Sentencas: A novel application of interior search optimizer (ISO) to define the necessary parameters to model solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) for further studies is presented.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: Sum of mean squared error (SMSE) is used to formulate the objective function to be optimized by the ISO subject to the validity of predefined constraints.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: The current study is carried out into two phases: i) under steady-state; various case studies under various operating conditions are demonstrated, and ii) at later stage, scenarios for transient performance of a SOFC system are investigated.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: In the same context, MATLAB/SIMULINK is used to implement the proposed ISO-based method.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: A standard proportional-integral (PO-controller is engaged to the dynamic model to improve its performance during transient disturbances.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: Transient responses of the stack current and voltage are analyzed due to load changes.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: Additionally, the hydrogen and oxygen flow rates along hydrogen utilization are investigated.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: For all test cases, detailed comparisons to other competing recent algorithms such as satin bowerbird algorithm, grasshopper optimizer and genetic algorithm are made to validate the numerical results.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm

Sentencas: It can be emphasized that the comparisons along other demonstrations indicate the viability of the proposed ISO-based method in defining the unknown parameters of the SOFCs efficiently.
Titulo: Optimized Parameters of SOFC for steady state and transient simulations using interior search algorithm
